lines.text: There's those melted candles over there...
You think maybe he was a candle salesman? Dropped his stock when the fire happened?
You know what? I don't think the masked burglar with the gun was a candle salesman, actually.
Hey, times are tough for the candle business!
Their best clients have all been criminalized! If you're going to sell candles, most of your customers are gonna be wizards.
That's just economics. Supply and demand. No surprise a candle salesman would get mixed up in crime!
Okay, you can keep talking, but for my ears' sake, I'm not going to listen to it.
Stop stigmatizing candle salesmen! End candlephobia today!
If I were still listening to you, I'd tell you to shut up.
